create.notes: Successfully created 'Validation Test Space' with description. Form includes Name, Description, and Permissions fields. Default permission is 'Private to you'.

read.notes: Successfully viewed space details including contents (folders and pages). Space detail view shows space name, description, contents list, and action buttons.

update.notes: Successfully updated space name from 'Validation Test Space' to 'Validation Test Space - Updated'. Edit dialog allows changing name and description.

delete.notes: Successfully moved space to trash. Confirmation dialog warns about 30-day retention: 'It'll be permanently deleted after 30 days.'

workflow_integration.notes: Knowledge Hub has 5 event triggers available in the workflow system but no actions. This means workflows can be triggered by Knowledge Hub events but cannot perform actions on Knowledge Hub entities.

known_limitations.issue: Sharing Knowledge Hub Spaces on Newsfeed is inconsistent and may not work reliably
known_limitations.limitation: The sharing functionality between Knowledge Hub and Newsfeed has technical inconsistencies that prevent reliable sharing of spaces
known_limitations.workaround: Use the 'Copy Link' option to share spaces directly via link instead of posting to Newsfeed
known_limitations.validation_notes: Unable to fully validate without creating test content and attempting Newsfeed share. This is a known backend integration issue.

known_limitations.issue: Limited in-browser preview support for non-PDF file formats
known_limitations.limitation: The in-browser document viewer only supports PDF files. Other document formats (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc.) require downloading to view
known_limitations.workaround: Download non-PDF files to view them locally, or convert documents to PDF format before uploading
known_limitations.validation_notes: Unable to validate without uploading test documents in various formats. This is a known viewer limitation.
